main event: A witness reported seeing an unidentified object, described as a balloon, at North Bend AFS, Oregon.
interesting points: The observation lasted for about 2 minutes,The object was reported to be moving southward,It was described as having glowing orange lights,The observation was made from ground visual and the object's flight was maintained despite weather conditions,There was no conventional air traffic known in the area during the sighting.
sighted object: unidentified object described as a balloon
witness description: observer reported observing a glowing orange object
